name: Adventures in Deep Space
description:
Title: Adventures in Deep Space

Platform: Web

Game Genre: Shooter 

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: In this arcade shooter, you're playing as Captain Force. The lone star pilot has been sent out tasked with clearing the path for the rest of the Star Fleet. In various rounds, you'll have to defeat enemies clearing a crucial path towards the enemy.  Good Luck!

 Instructions: Use the arrow keys or A, D to move, and Space to shoot.

Game Design Team: 

Game Designer - Ryan Circelli

Background Music - Adam Bielecki

SFX - GWriterStudio

Sprites and VFX -DinV Studio
